lead_paragraph: The guide, which originally compared correspondents to spies, now lauds “independent reporting,” but leaves unchanged other sections scholarly critics called inaccurate.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon Revises Law of War Manual to Protect Press
headline.main: Pentagon Revamps Law of War Manual to Protect Journalists

snippet: The guide, which originally compared correspondents to spies, now lauds “independent reporting,” but leaves unchanged other sections scholarly critics called inaccurate....
abstract: Defense Dept revises its Law of War Manual, adding language to protect battlefield reporters; 2015 edition of manual elicited criticism over section on war correspondents, which many felt allowed journalism to be interpreted as form of spying, potentially putting reporters at greater risk.
